turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello! How may I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to place a pickup order for the Starbucks at the 1427 Lee Street location in Des Plaines, Illinois.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what drink would you like to get started?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get one caffe Americano venti size, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% if you could, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and finally, any syrups or sweeteners?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get three splendors added as well?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok sounds good. Will that be all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That will be all for this.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You would like a venti hot cafe americano with 2% milk and 3 splendas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like the order made now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, order has been sent to starbucks on 1427 lee street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your order will be ready soon.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome!
